title: exoncenter
author: exoncenter
created_time: February 08, 2023, 11:23:41 AMLast edit: February 08, 2023, 02:52:16 PM by exoncenter
content: Terms and Conditions● The Bounty campaign will start on 9 February.● Rewards: 1video=5$ in token EXON.● All participants must join EXON CENTER on social media:- Telegram Channel- Twitter- Instagram - Facebook - YouTube● Participants can not change their wallet address after registration. Please double check your wallet address beforeregistration.● Please read the terms and conditions carefully. For non-compliance, even minor, you will not receive reward or will be excluded from the bounty program.● Use of multi-accounts, spam, bots and other is strictly forbidden, all attempts will be banned.● Bounty managers reserve the right to change the conditions of the bounty campaign.● Format for proof of authentication post:Quote#PROOF OF REGISTRATIONForum Profile Link:Forum Username:YouTube Profile Link:Your TRX address from the TronLink wallet:• Each participant can send 1 videos only.• Participants must have at least 1000+ TikTok subscribers. • Minimum amount 10 video on account.• Videos need to be a minimum of 30 seconds in length.• Only original video content will be accepted. Copy from TikTok profiles or from other’s work will be rejected.• You can use the media materials posted on the site EXON.• Video Content must focus on a relevant topic: project EXON CENTER, project features, EXON NFT, EXON SWAP, EXON FARMING, EXON IDO, etc.• All videos need to have Proof of Authentication. Please insert your Bitcointalk Username in the description. • Videos should never be removed. Removal/deletion will result in disqualification.• All videos must have the following hashtags: #exoncenter #nft #dex Some ideas for the video:•   How to mint NFT.•   How to buy EXON to a pair to choose USDT/EXON or TRX/EXON.•   How to add in liquidity to a pair USDT/EXON or TRX/EXON.•   How to withdraw part or all of liquidity.•   Tell about the prospects of EXON CENTER.•   Compare EXON with other DEX exchanges, what are the pros and cons.•   Explain the EXON architecture. Why is it unique and what are its benefits?•   What are the benefits of EXON in comparison with other competing projects?How to join:1. Make a video review of project EXON CENTER.2. Fill the registration Form.4. Verify your status in Spreadsheet.
